text: Anndee wonnde kala ko konɗon e huunde, pellet, hino woodani Alla e Nulaaɗo Makko on jowaɓal mun, e jom-ɓadondiral, e wonɗuɓe (Alyatimeebe) ɓen, e waasuɓe ɓen, e ɓiɗɓe laawol ɓen, si on laatike gomɗimɓe Alla e kon ko Men Jippini e jeyaaɗo Amen on, Ñalnde sertugol (goonga e fenaande): ñalnde dente ɗen ɗiɗi fottunoo. Alla ko hattanɗo kala huunde
